body_content.explanation: the act of making something part of something larger again after a period when it was not part of that thing:
examples: She oversaw the reincorporation of the East into a united Germany.
The film ends with the reincorporation of the outlaws into society.

body_content.explanation: the act of closing down a business and starting it up again as a new organization:
examples: The reincorporation in Florida was part of an attempt to reduce costs.
Our re-incorporation will have no effect whatsoever on our long-term plans.
